content: turn some heads with this colorful crochet cowl to keep you cozy stitched in red heart super saver o go camel stitch or half_double_crochet in the third loop is an attractive stitch that makes crochet look almost like knitting worked in a continuous spiral there are no unattractive seams this simple cowl is a great way to learn and practice a new stitch while the yarn takes care of the colorwork it s a fun pattern and a gift that really impresses
